title: Co-hydrothermal carbonization of pretreated sludge and polyethylene terephthalate for the preparation of low-nitrogen clean solid fuels
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17326-17337
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02165G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ting Ye, Le Gou, Yue Wang, Nan Liu, Liyi Dai, Yuanyuan Wang
In this work, polyethylene terephthalate (PET) and sewage sludge (SS) were co-hydrothermally carbonized to produce low-nitrogen solid fuels.
